caption:
This photograph captures a tender moment between a man and a woman in a natural, lush environment. The man, with medium-length dark hair and a moustache, is dressed in a light yellow polo shirt, and is gently tucking a strand of hair behind the woman's ear. He is smiling softly, looking at the woman with affection.

The woman, with long brown hair, is wearing a light blue sleeveless top decorated with small green flowers. She has a subtle, content smile on her face and appears relaxed, enjoying the man's gesture. Her head is tilted slightly to the side, and she is wearing hoop earrings and a thin headband.

The background consists of dense green foliage, with visible tree trunks providing a textured backdrop. The setting suggests a peaceful, wooded area, enhancing the intimacy and serene mood of the scene. The natural light softly illuminates their faces, highlighting the warm interaction between them.
title: Young man picks leaves from his girl's hair after they had embraced on the banks of the Frio Canyon River near Leakey, Texas and San Antonio.
